title: Embedded Systems Engineering
description: In a team of four, design, development, and implementation of a software architecture on two Festo sorting systems with QNX (RTOS).
extra_description: Focus areas: Interrupt handling, Finite State Machines, Fail-Safe.

title: Computer Networks
description: Design and implementation of a TCP-based peer-to-peer application protocol with an overlay network.

title: Stereoimage rectification
description: Stereo image rectification pipeline to generate 3D-viewable images for use with 3D glasses, applying different filters to enhance and optimize visual output.

title: Web browser Engineering
description: Built a simplified web browser from scratch as part of a group of over 15, based on the browser.engineering book, implementing key components such as HTML parsing, CSS-based rendering, and basic networking.

title: Cyber-Physical Systems
description: Developed a cyber-physical system simulation of 3D printers and repair robots, featuring a MAPE loop for adaptive control.
